full_summary:
# Request for Supply Arrangement: Explosive Ordinance Disposal, Improvised Explosive Devices, Training Services and Tools

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4059013483
* **Title:** Explosive Ordinance Disposal, Improvised Explosive Devices, Training Services and Tools
* **Reference Number:** WS4059013483-Doc4061493002
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** June 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 31, 2028 at 14:00 EDT

## Solicitation Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure training services and tools related to Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD) and Improvised Explosive Devices (IEDs). Suppliers must meet all Mandatory Technical Criteria (MTC) to be considered for this request. The period of the Supply Arrangement is from issue to March 31, 2028.

## Instructions to Bidders

The solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers. Offers may be submitted at any time during the solicitation period. The Supply Arrangements will be issued in the order that compliant offers are received. The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 31, 2028 at 14:00 EDT.

## Important Information

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Shamael Malko-Moore
	+ Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not provided
	+ Fax: Not provided

## How to Access the Solicitation

The solicitation document is available on Ariba Discovery at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16625649?extsite=MTY2MjU2NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16625649?extsite=MTY2MjU2NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk
